item.title: 诺和诺德试验失败引发丹麦股市震荡
item.description: 诺和诺德公司令人失望的业绩数据在丹麦股市引发震荡，拖累整体市场走低，凸显该国经济与这家肥胖症药物制造商的紧密关联。【原文：Disappointing data from Novo Nordisk A/S is sending shockwaves across equities in Denmark, dragging the wider market down and underscoring how tightly the country’s fortunes are tied to the obesity-drug maker.】

item.title: 中国获益，特朗普被迫调整关税政策
item.description: 习近平主席将于下月接待美国同行，而这位美国同行突然失去了其惯用的施压手段。【原文：President Xi will host a US counterpart next month who has been suddenly denied his favored means of leverage.】

item.title: 美国人对牛排情有独钟，无论代价多高
item.description:
牛肉价格创历史新高。新型经济实惠的部位正满足市场需求。【原文：

Beef prices are at an-all time high. New budget-friendly cuts are meeting demand.

】

item.title: 千禧退出催生两家新对冲基金，筹资目标达14亿美元
item.description: 在千禧管理公司去年终止创始人此前管理的基金后，两只新商品对冲基金正寻求共同募集14亿美元资产。【原文：Two new commodities hedge funds are seeking to raise a collective $1.4 billion in assets after Millennium Management pulled the plug on the founders’ previous fund last year.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛首席执行官称公司正寻求并购机会以助扭亏为盈
item.description: 雅诗兰黛集团正积极寻求收购机会，这家拥有乔·马龙和Le Labo品牌的母公司正进入首席执行官斯蒂芬·德拉法维里领导的转型计划第二年。【原文：Estée Lauder Cos. is open to acquisitions as the owner of the Jo Malone and Le Labo brands enters the second year of a turnaround plan under Chief Executive Officer Stéphane de La Faverie.】

item.title: 卫星运营商欧洲卫星通信公司寻求15亿欧元债务再融资
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星公司正寻求筹集15亿欧元（约合18亿美元），这家卫星公司计划在政府救助后对未偿债务进行再融资。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA is seeking to raise €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion) as the satellite company looks to refinance outstanding debt after government rescue.】

item.title: 另类指标显示：富豪担忧中透出股市看涨信号
item.description: 尽管推动美国股市的因素众多——从人工智能到关税问题的新不确定性，再到地缘政治焦虑——但美国消费者的健康状况仍是决定标普500指数能否突破近期波动区间的关键因素。【原文：For all the forces driving the US stock market — from AI to fresh uncertainty on tariffs to geopolitical angst — the health of the American consumer remains a key determinant for whether the S&P 500 Index will break out of its recent range.】

item.title: 卡塔尔贷款机构筹备AT1债券交易，中东地区销售热潮持续升温
item.description: 卡塔尔历史最悠久的私营贷款机构计划发行自2021年以来首只补充一级资本债券，加入该地区众多发行机构行列，共同推出这种高风险银行债务产品。【原文：Qatar’s oldest private lender plans to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond since 2021 as it joins a spate of issuers offering the risky bank debt in the region.】

item.title: 嘉士伯据悉启动印度子公司7亿美元IPO进程
item.description: 据知情人士透露，嘉士伯集团已任命三家银行，并开始为其印度子公司潜在的上市计划做准备，该计划可能筹集高达7亿美元的资金。【原文：Carlsberg A/S has appointed three banks and begun preparations for a potential listing of its India unit that could raise as much as $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度财政部长西塔拉曼称，印度吸引外国资金"完全有理由"
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔玛拉·西塔拉曼表示，印度吸引外国资金"完全有理由"，尽管在经历数月波动后，海外资金流入仍保持温和态势，且落后于区域内其他国家。【原文：India has “every reason” to attract foreign funds, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said, even as overseas inflows remain modest and lag behind regional peers following months of volatility.】

item.title: NatWest计划在并购推进中实施与商业房地产贷款挂钩的风险转移
item.description: NatWest集团正与投资者商讨发行一项与商业房地产贷款挂钩的大额风险转移工具，此举有望在收购Evelyn Partners计划完成后增强其资本储备。【原文：NatWest Group Plc is in discussions with investors to issue a significant risk transfer tied to commercial real estate loans, a move that could help its capital reserves after a planned acquisition of Evelyn Partners.】

item.title: 印度在关税裁决后对美贸易协议看到更多选择
item.description: 知情人士称，美国最高法院推翻特朗普总统紧急关税的裁决，为印度在贸易协定谈判中提供了更大回旋余地。【原文：The US Supreme Court decision to strike down President Donald Trump’s emergency tariffs gives India more scope in negotiations over a trade deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 率先撤离的正是那些曾大量涌入美国比特币基金的对冲基金
item.description: 曾助推美国交易所比特币基金热潮的对冲基金正迅速撤离。【原文：Hedge funds that helped fuel a boom in US exchange-traded funds holding Bitcoin are in rapid retreat.】

item.title: 东南亚市场表现疲软，IPO候选企业纷纷转向海外
item.description: 东南亚各地的企业正将目光投向海外市场进行股票发售，因为该地区部分区域持续低迷的表现正拖累着本土市场。【原文：Companies across Southeast Asia are looking overseas to sell shares, as persistent underperformance in some parts of the region weighs on markets at home.】

item.title: 德国商业前景改善，经济复苏初现端倪
item.description: 德国2月份商业信心指数增幅超出预期，这进一步增强了人们的希望，即欧洲最大经济体正从持续多年的低迷中复苏。【原文：German business confidence brightened more than anticipated in February, adding to hope that Europe’s largest economy is emerging from a yearslong malaise.】

item.title: 高盛称土耳其银行股2027年仍有上涨空间
item.description: 高盛集团分析师指出，土耳其银行股近期上涨后仍有上涨空间，预计2027年通胀放缓和利率下降将提振该行业。【原文：Turkish bank stocks have more room to run after their recent rally, according to analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc., who expect weaker inflation and falling interest rates to boost the sector in 2027.】

item.title: 欧洲央行加强对欧洲银行人工智能行业风险敞口的审查力度
item.description: 欧洲央行正深入研究人工智能行业给该地区银行带来的风险，因市场对隐藏信贷风险和金融业颠覆性影响的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The European Central Bank is delving into the risks faced by banks in the region from the artificial intelligence industry, amid heightened concern over hidden credit exposures and financial-sector disruption.】

item.title: 艾莉森·罗曼征服番茄酱市场的计划
item.description:
一位超级受欢迎的美食作家踏入了消费品领域。【原文：

A mega-popular food writer enters the world of consumer goods.

】

item.title: 零散新闻：艾莉森·罗曼进军番茄酱市场（播客）
item.description: 艾莉森·罗曼是美食媒体界的一位传奇人物。她创作了多本畅销食谱，其中若干食谱更在网络上引发热潮。她的电子通讯也拥有惊人的读者量。 如今她将个人品牌延伸至消费品领域，近期推出高端罐装番茄酱新品——恰如其名《绝妙酱汁》，通过线上直售渠道销售。那么她对消费品行业及其供应链有何洞见？本期节目中，她将阐述进军该领域的初衷。【原文：Alison Roman is a cult figure in the world of food media. She’s written multiple hit cookbooks and several of her recipes have gone viral. And her newsletter is incredibly popular. Now, she’s putting her name on consumer goods, recently launching a new line of high-end jarred tomato sauce called, appropriately, A Very Good Sauce, which she sells direct online. So what has she learned about the consumer goods industry and its supply chain? On this episode, she explains why she entered the space,】

item.title: 中国智能手机制造商荣耀计划推出类人服务机器人
item.description: 荣耀设备公司将于本周晚些时候推出其首款人形机器人，加入中国企业竞相进军新兴科技领域的行列。【原文：Honor Device Co. will unveil its first humanoid robot later this week, joining a rush by Chinese companies into a burgeoning sector of new technology.】

item.title: 汉莎航空在最后一个季度通过削减成本保持单位成本稳定
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司第四季度成功保持单位成本稳定，表明首席执行官卡斯滕·施波尔的削减成本举措开始见效。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG managed to keep unit costs stable in the fourth quarter, indicating that Chief Executive Officer Carsten Spohr’s cost-cutting push is beginning to pay off.】

item.title: 德国汽车供应商因电动汽车转型放缓而获得债务减免
item.description: ZF弗里德里希港股份公司正因电动汽车转型步伐放缓而获得债务负担的喘息之机，这提振了对变速箱等关键零部件的需求。【原文：ZF Friedrichshafen AG is getting some reprieve from its debt burden with the slower shift to electric cars boosting demand for key components such as gearboxes.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔大幅降价收购庄信万丰催化剂业务
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司签署修订协议，以较低价格收购庄信万丰催化剂技术业务，并将获得必要审批的截止日期延长。【原文：Honeywell International Inc. entered an amended agreement to acquire Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies, cutting the purchase price and extending the deadline to secure necessary approvals.】

item.title: 沙索增产并增加对冲操作，因油价暴跌拖累利润
item.description: 尽管这家燃料和化工生产商提高了产量并采取对冲措施以应对油价波动，但受原油价格下跌影响，萨索尔有限公司的利润仍大幅下滑。【原文：Sasol Ltd.’s profit plunged on lower crude prices even as the fuel and chemical producer boosted output and hedged against oil volatility.】

item.title: 费沙拉基称，随着美国和伊朗似乎即将开战，油价将飙升
item.description: 能源市场咨询机构FGE NexantECA指出，随着美国与伊朗之间的战争似乎迫在眉睫，油价有望大幅上涨。【原文：Oil stands to rally strongly as war between the US and Iran looks imminent, according to energy market consultancy FGE NexantECA.】

item.title: 意电集团将斥资630亿美元扩大美欧可再生能源投资
item.description: 意大利国家电力公司计划在未来三年深化其在美国和欧洲的业务布局，对风电和电池储能等可再生能源项目展开新一轮投资。【原文：Enel SpA plans to deepen its commitments in the US and Europe over the next three years, with a fresh wave of investments in renewable energy projects such as wind power and battery storage.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正物色人工智能无法触及的资产
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正加码布局新兴市场投资，这些投资不受人工智能热潮影响。该公司副首席投资官吉塔尼亚·坎达里表示，此举旨在为科技板块可能出现的回调做好准备，该板块目前已呈现拥挤态势。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management is adding to emerging-market bets that are insulated from the artificial intelligence boom as it positions for a potential pullback in the crowded tech trade, according to Deputy Chief Investment Officer Jitania Kandhari.】

item.title: 关税不确定性引发连锁反应，股市或将下跌
印度基础设施贷款机构从汇丰银行获得1.25亿美元贷款
item.description: 印度基础设施贷款机构通过首次外币借款筹集了约1.25亿美元，为获取更深厚的全球资本铺平了道路。【原文：India’s infrastructure lender has secured about $125 million through its maiden foreign-currency borrowing, paving the way for access to a deeper pool of global capital.】

item.title: 沙特企业推进IPO计划，提振低迷本土股市
item.description: 多家沙特企业正推进本土上市计划，在油价波动和地缘政治风险拖累基准指数之际，于利雅得市场试探投资者需求。【原文：Several Saudi Arabian firms are pressing ahead with plans for local listings, testing investor appetite in Riyadh at a time when volatile oil prices and geopolitical risks have weighed on the benchmark index.】
